CIRCULAR NO. 9 / 2003 
 
 
SUB : MINIMUM SPECIFICATIONS / STANDARDS FOR X-RAY BAGGAGE 
INSPECTION SYSTEM (X-RAY BIS) FOR SCREENING OF HAND 
BAGGAGE, REGISTERED BAGGAGE UNACCOMPANIED BAGGAGE, 
CARGO, MAIL ETC. 
 
 
In continuation of this Bureau Circular No. 3 / 2003 dated 23.1.2003, the 
following instructions on the above subject shall be implemented by the 
concerned agency / department. 
 
(i) 
In order to ensure that the x-ray machines are procured by the concerned 
agencies in accordance with the specifications / standards prescribed by the 
BCAS from time to time, the x-ray machines shall be checked by a Committee 
comprising the following technical experts before installation at the airport. 
 
 
Composition f the Committee: 
 
• 
AD (Tech.) IB (MHA) 
• 
Dy. Secretary (Tech.), R & AW 
• 
Director Security, Air India / Indian Airlines / AAI (concerned procuring 
agency) 
• 
AD (Tech.), BCAS 
(ii) 
The X-ray machine shall be installed only after certification by the above 
committee that the x-ray machines meet the required specifications / standards. 
 
(iii) 
Site for installation shall be jointly decided by representatives of BCAS 
and Airport Director / Airport Management, AAI of the concerned airport. 
 
 
 
(R.K.Singh) 
 
 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
